results.name: Triangle read by rows, A034839 * (A027826 * 0^(n-k))
comment: Row sums = A027826, the eigensequence of triangle A034839.
formula: A034839 * (A027826 * 0^(n-k)) = A034839 * an infinite lower triangular matrix with A027826: (1, 1, 2, 4, 9, 21, 50, 120,...) and the rest zeros.
